title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.4 - Penalty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.4 - Penalty

State Regulations

If any person permanently appointed to a position (other
than stenographic or clerical) on the permanent staff of a district office
either fails to establish or fails to continue his residence within the
prescribed area, it shall be cause for discharge from his position by the
appointing authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
497.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
